main event: Two witnesses reported seeing a bright light or several bright lights maneuvering in the sky over the Brooklyn area, with the lights hovering, moving rapidly, and making sudden changes in direction. Some witnesses also reported hearing a humming sound associated with the lights.
interesting points: The witnesses included people who worked at the Brooklyn Navy Yard.
The sightings occurred during the evening hours, usually between 7:00 P.M. and 10:00 P.M.
The investigators were unable to identify the cause of the sightings, as there were no reports of aircraft or other known objects in the area at the time.
The investigators will continue to investigate the matter and provide any additional information as it becomes available.
The second report describes the interior and exterior details of a circular, dome-shaped object approximately 30 feet in diameter, with a dull silver or gray metallic appearance.
sighted object: Bright lights, possibly multiple objects, maneuvering in the sky
witnesses: People working at the Brooklyn Navy Yard
